name: CoronaLOOP
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 47.

INSTRUCTIONS:
- Destroy all virus before losing all your linfocites.
- If a virus hits a cell, it creates another virus.
- Linfocites can kill 2 virus before dying.
- Use ARROW keys to control the camera.
- Use SPACEBAR to dodge cells.
- Use ESCAPE to go back to the menu.
